product_name: Innova Disc Golf Champion Starfire Distance Driver Disc
long_description: The Innova Champion Starfire driver disc is ideal for advanced players who want a consistently fast, dependable disc. They'll love its stellar performance. Long range disc gobbles up distance with amazing glide, good fade and great control. Crafted from a blend of resilient polymer plastics to offer the best combination of grip and durability. The Innova Champion Starfire driver disc is PDGA approved for use on all disc golf courses. Sorry, color and weight requests cannot be accommodated; please shop in-store for specific colors and weights.
